faq.return_policy: You can return items within 14 days of delivery. The product must be unused and in original packaging.
faq.refund_policy: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.
faq.shipping_time: Standard shipping takes 3–5 business days. Express option takes 1–2 days.
faq.payment_methods: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and Cash on Delivery (COD).
